name: Crazy Supermarket Adventure
description:
Welcome to the Crazy Supermarket Adventure! Explore the supermarket world with many popular mini-games for kids. Help your customers shop and get ready for some fun!

This supermarket has a lot of sections: a cash register, departments for grocery, cheese and salami, fruits and vegetables, sweets, and toys, a recycling area and other.

Do all the necessary tasks and provide superb shopping services to meet your customers’ needs.

Have you ever wanted to shop at a Real Grocery store, check out items for customers, and scan and weigh produce, candy, and more?

Take the items and scan them at the register - place the produce, and other food items on the scale, and weigh them to price them all out!

Tag the produce like fruit and veggies, and put price tags on the bags!

Then get ready to check the customer out! Scan the items, and check the customer out using a realistic Supermarket Cash Register!

Punch in the prices for the items, and swipe the credit card to complete the transaction!

Choose from a variety of Grocery Aisles like Fruit and Vegetables, Cupcakes & Candy, Bread & Milk, Meat & Fish! Even choose to restock the supply room, and let the customer purchase items from there!

Earn coins after completing each level! Buy more coins to unlock more areas!

********************* About Creative Games *****************************

Creative Games brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by all peoples. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for all peoples. Stay with us for the latest updates of Creative Games on Google play and get more of games.


Don't forget to give us a good rate if you enjoy our game!
